attributes.action: Increase the Front Line Soldiers Wage.
attributes.additional_details:
Honour the military covenant by ensuring that no soldier, sailor or airman ever lives in poverty after serving their country, and that front line troops who come face to face with the enemy, and lay their lives on the line, are paid for their sacrifices.
Ensure that a wage mirrors responsibility AND selflessness for ones country, in all employment, be it MP or Infantry.
